node.title: Sara Duterte is running for vice-president of the Philippines, and she may have to take her father on
node.alt: Sara Duterte, daughter of Philippine president Rodrigo Duterte, gestures as she speaks into a mic in this 2017 file photo.
node.description: The popular longtime mayor's candidacy for vice-president comes as a surprise because opinion polls show her ahead in the race for preferred presidential candidate.
node.content:
["The daughter of Philippine leader Rodrigo Duterte filed her candidacy for the vice-presidency, her spokesperson has said, ending months of speculation about her 2022 election plans.", "Sara Duterte-Carpio entered the vice-presidential race by way of substitution after her political party's original candidate withdrew, her spokesperson said.", "The 43-year-old mother of three is a\u00a0lawyer, like her father.", "She has also\u00a0been a\u00a0longtime mayor of Davao, an economically vibrant city where her father\u00a0first carved a political name with his populist rhetoric and often bloody approach against criminality.", "President Rodrigo Duterte is also expected to file for the vice-presidency position on November 15, a spokesman\u00a0told local media, which would\u00a0set\u00a0up a potential father-daughter contest.", "President Duterte had said earlier this year that\u00a0his daughter would not be running for elections as the presidency is \"not for women\".", "", "
Philippine President Rodrigo Duterte has previously said he\u00a0was\u00a0retiring from politics.(Reuters: Eloisa Lopez)
", "He later suggested she could, however, team up with one of his loyalists for a\u00a0run.", "A month ago, President Duterte announced he was retiring from politics.", "
A controversial running mate
", "Shortly after her candidacy papers were filed by a representative, the\u00a0political party of Ferdinand Marcos Jr, the son and namesake of the late Philippine dictator who has registered to run for president, adopted Ms Duterte-Carpio as its vice-presidential choice.", "Mr Marcos Jr is the son of Ferdinand Marcos, who was toppled in a 1986 \"people power\" pro-democracy uprising and died in US exile three years later.", "Mr Marcos had placed the Philippines under martial law in 1972 in an era that was marked by widespread atrocities and economic plunder.", "\"It has the most self-serving aims: a Marcos restoration and the protection of outgoing President Rodrigo Duterte.\"", "Mr Reyes said the Duterte-Marcos alliance \"serves only the narrow interests of their dynastic families.\"", "Mr Marcos Jr says the allegations against his father are \"lies\".", "Ms Duterte-Carpio's\u00a0decision to seek the vice presidency came as a surprise as she has led opinion polls throughout this year as the preferred presidential candidate.\u00a0", "In the Philippines, president is elected separately from the vice president.", "The Southeast Asian nation of 110 million people holds elections in May 2022 for positions from president down to governors, mayors and local officials.", "Reuters/AP"]
